faqSubtitle.message: Find answers to common questions about Holy Private Bookmarks

faqSecurity1Answer.message: All your bookmarks are encrypted locally using AES-256-GCM encryption with a master password. Your data never leaves your computer. Even we cannot access your bookmarks without your password.

faqSecurity2.message: What happens if I forget my password?

faqSecurity2Answer.message: Warning: Your password cannot be recovered. We don't store your password or any recovery keys. If you forget your password, you will lose access to all your encrypted bookmarks permanently. Please save your password in a secure password manager.

faqSecurity3.message: Why do I need to enter my password every time?

faqSecurity3Warning.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è This is by design and cannot be changed

faqSecurity3Answer.message: Holy Private Bookmarks is built on a zero-trust security model. Requiring password entry every time is not a limitation‚Äîit's the core security feature.

faqSecurity3Reason1.message: True zero-knowledge: We never store your password, session tokens, or decryption keys

faqSecurity3Reason2.message: Defense in depth: Even with physical access to your computer, your bookmarks remain protected

faqSecurity3Reason3.message: No single point of failure: There are no backdoors, recovery keys, or password reset options

faqSecurity3Reason4.message: Browser security limitations: Chrome extensions cannot securely persist authentication between sessions

faqSecurity3Benefit1.message: Protection against theft: If your device is stolen, your bookmarks remain encrypted

faqSecurity3Benefit2.message: No forensic traces: Nothing is stored in browser storage that could be recovered

faqSecurity3Benefit3.message: Malware resistance: Even keyloggers only capture one-time password entry

faqSecurity3TipText.message: Use a password manager like Bitwarden or KeePass. With auto-fill, entering your password takes just 2 seconds while maintaining maximum security.

faqSecurity3Conclusion.message: Remember: Every time you enter your password, you're verifying that YOU are the only person who can access your private bookmarks. This is the price of true privacy.

faqUsage1Answer.message: You can add bookmarks in several ways:

faqUsage1Method1.message: Click the '+' button in the popup to add the current page

faqUsage1Method2.message: Right-click on any page or link and select 'Add to Holy Private Bookmarks'

faqUsage1Method3.message: Use the manager to add bookmarks manually

faqUsage1Method4.message: Import from Chrome bookmarks via Settings

faqUsage2.message: How do I organize bookmarks into folders?

faqUsage2Answer.message: You can create folders and subfolders to organize your bookmarks:

faqUsage2Step2.message: Click 'New Folder' or right-click in the tree view

faqUsage2Step3.message: Drag and drop bookmarks into folders

faqUsage2Step4.message: Use the manager for advanced organization

faqFeatures1.message: What's the difference between popup and manager?

faqFeatures1Answer.message:
Popup: Quick access for adding/viewing bookmarks. Automatically locks after 10 minutes.

Manager: Full-featured interface with search, grid view, advanced editing, and folder management. Also auto-locks for security.

faqFeatures2Answer.message: Yes! Go to Settings ‚Üí Export & Import ‚Üí Export Bookmarks. This creates an encrypted backup file. You can restore it anytime using the Import option.

faqFeatures3Answer.message: This feature removes your Chrome browsing history for domains that are in your bookmarks. It helps maintain privacy by automatically clearing history traces of bookmarked sites.

faqUsage3Answer.message: Use the search bar in the manager (full interface) to search through all your bookmarks by title or URL. The popup shows a filtered tree view of all bookmarks.

faqTrouble2.message: Will my bookmarks sync between devices?

faqTrouble2Answer.message: Currently, bookmarks are stored locally on your device. You can manually export/import to transfer between devices. Cloud sync is planned for future versions.

faqTrouble3Answer.message: If 'Add to Holy Private Bookmarks' doesn't appear in right-click menu:

faqTrouble3Step3.message: Try on a different page (some pages restrict context menus)

faqContactUs.message: Contact us or check the GitHub repository:
